text: Samuel Soler Martin (born May 18, 1979 in Plasencia, CÃ¡ceres) is a swimmer from Spain. He has a disability: he has cerebral palsy and is an S3 type swimmer. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished third in the 200 meter freestyle race. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1979 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:People from Extremadura Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type S3
title: Samuel Soler Martin
